text: How we seek your feedback on the postgraduate experience.

Graduate Studies Committee (GSC) meets 4 times a year, reporting to
the Board Of Studies (BoS) and consisting of:

4 members of staff including the Chair, Director of Graduate Studies, a
formal Secretary and an academic representative of each research area
plus research postgraduate reps spanning areas and modes of
postgraduate research.

If you wish to raise any issues for consideration at the GSC please
contact your reps who will bring it to the attention of the committee.
Meetings are usually in October, December, March and June.

e The Board of Studies in Chemistry membership comprises of academic
staff, an Undergraduate and a Postgraduate rep and reports up to Faculty

e The Postgraduate Research Experience Survey (PRES) enables UK
universities to gather and benchmark data and information about the
experience of research students on a doctoral or research masterâ€™s course -
